programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Convicted for a crime she didn't commit and haunted by mysterious Shadows, Lucinda Price is sent to Sword and Cross, an isolated correctional facility; there, she meets Daniel, who feels they've met before, and Cam, who knows why she's there.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: After her solitary punishment, Luce questions her memory of what happened to Cam; she tries to retrieve his medical records, but Daniel refuses to help; Cassie, the only one to escape, encounters a nightmarish creature.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Luce suspects Howson is controlling their memories and steals photos of her and others undergoing medical procedures; while on a hike, Howson learns of Cassie's attack and brings her to Sword and Cross.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Howson captures the creature that attacked Luce in the lake and interrogates it; while Luce comforts Daniel over Cassie's death, Penn uncovers troubling truths about her past; with her father's arrival, Luce and Daniel get the medical files.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Luce learns Daniel hasn't aged in over twenty years; determined to expose the truth, she plans a breakout with Daniel as proof; Howson is tipped off, and the Outcast injures Daniel; Luce finds the body of another Lucinda Price.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Luce learns Daniel hasn't aged in over twenty years; determined to expose the truth, she plans a breakout with Daniel as proof; Howson is tipped off, and the Outcast injures Daniel; Luce finds the body of another Lucinda Price.

programme.sub-title: Six Characters in Search of an Exit

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Miss Miriam reveals some secrets of Sword & Cross; Luce faces her own struggles, fearing she'll die if they stay together; Luce has a vision of Penn's death and tries to prevent her from leaving, but someone is waiting for Penn with deadly intent.

programme.title: Fallen

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: In Oxford's library, American historian and reluctant witch Diana Bishop unwittingly calls up an ancient magical manuscript, and finds herself confronted by geneticist and vampire Matthew Clairmont, who is determined to get his hands on the book.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Blind to the interest she has stirred amongst creatures, Diana fights an increasing pull towards the magical and turns her back on her witch heritage; matters take an unexpectedly dark turn when Satu is sent by Peter Knox to intimidate her.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Domenico takes Satu's information to menacing vampire Gerbert, who gains the advantage he has been waiting for; Diana refuses to help Knox realize his longing to destroy the vampires and answers his threats with a force of untamed elemental power.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Matthew's hope of keeping Diana safe is short-lived as Ysabeau refuses to welcome the warmblood; Knox calls an emergency meeting of the Congregation to denounce Matthew; Matthew's ferocious brother, Baldwin, plays a careful game to maintain control.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Gillian pays a price for her disloyalty to Diana; the vampires study witch DNA; the fall-out threatens the fragile equilibrium between creatures and the focus is on ending Matthew and Diana's relationship, whatever the cost.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Satu brutally tortures Diana in Gerbert's isolated castle ruins; Matthew, now sworn to hunt down and kill anyone who tries to harm Diana, attempts a daring airborne rescue mission with Baldwin in tow.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Diana learns the tragic circumstances surrounding why she was spellbound as a child; Diana's devastation at having lived her life as only half herself is interrupted by the Madison house releasing one of the missing pages from Ashmole 782.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Matthew's attempt to rescue Diana from Juliette goes horribly wrong; Diana discovers just how lethal her powers can be; as Matthew is dying, Diana must strike a dreadful bargain with the goddess and make the ultimate sacrificial pact.

programme.title: The Last Anniversary
programme.desc: Sophie discards one unsuitable suitor, just as another enters her life; Grace continues to struggle with motherhood, and her own mother, Enigma; Sophie and Veronika make a big discovery in the Baby Munro mystery.

programme.title: The Last Anniversary
